channel.description: nlin.SI updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Solvable nonlinear systems of 2 recursions displaying interesting evolutions
item.description: arXiv:2407.18270v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this paper a class of simple, but nonlinear, systems of recursions involving $2$ dependent variables $x_{j}\left( n\right) $ is identified, such that the solutions of their initial-values problems -- with arbitrary initial data $x_{j}\left( 0\right) $ -- may be explicitly obtained.
item.dc:creator: Francesco Calogero
